channel.title: Gem on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Gem on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Ruby Gem
item.description: remove all old versions of the gem gem cleanup rjb choose which ones you want to remove gem uninstall rjb remove version 1.1.9 only gem uninstall rjb –version 1.1.9 remove all versions less than 1.3.4 gem uninstall rjb –version ‘<1.3.4’
